Name: Jean-Paul Belmondo
Caption: Jean-Paul Belmondo in Cannes 2001.
Spouse: Elodie Constantin (1953-1965)   Ursula Andress (1966-1972)   Laura Antonelli (1972-1980)   Natty Tardivel (1989-2008)
